name: Toy Clash
description: Get ready for a fierce battle of cute toys on table-top! Use your mighty magic and unique toys to stop annoying opponents from making a disturbance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
